title: How to make script for drama - Quora

response.answer_text: To make a script for drama. Things which prerequisite for writing scripts are, First is story line and another is divide your story according to scene. Generally when we write drama script we don't change locations frequently because that doesn't make good drama. So consider only one or two place where all the scenes can be performed. After that you just have to think in the given scenario which kind of conversation can happen. and make a simple draft for that and until you don't get satisfy rewrite the dialogues. So this is the primary and easy way to start writing scripts.
